As a swift action when you cast a spell with a duration of at least 1 minute per caster level, you can increase the spellâ€™s effective caster level by 1 for the purpose of determining its duration and preventing attempts to dispel it. The effective caster level increases by an additional 1 for every 10 cleric levels you have (maximum +3). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

This power replaces the Hand of the Acolyte power of the Arcane Domain.
